publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6409.3 Pauline McNeill: Relationships between HM Government and the Scottish Parliament and Governmentâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-6409) in the name of Annabel Goldie, leave out from ", in particular," to end and insert "calls on the UK Government to implement the recommendations of the Commission on Scottish Devolution in full and without delay."
